attributes.action: Make the migrant visa restrictions more fair and ethical
attributes.additional_details: It should be unlawful to deny people the chance to live a better more sustainable life. They have chosen to come to the U.K. and we as U.K. citizens and government should be grateful.
attributes.background: Lower the pay amount needed to live in the U.K. by migrants. They fuel our economy and give  so much money to us, why only make the more well off be allowed to come here?

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel increase to minimum income requirement for Skilled Worker and Family visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652619

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
